arabic.title: أنا مش بعيد
text: بس انا فى القلب اكيد شايلك
جايلك فى ميعادى جايلك فى ميعادى
انا مش سايبك ده انا علشانك

english.title: Ana Mish Ba3eed
text: i'm not away from you darling
there are only two steps between us
and despite my longing and the fact of being close to you
it's hard for the eyes to meet
maybe you're in front of me but i can't reach you
but i'm carrying you in the heart for sure
no matter how much i get tired and no matter how much the road will be hard
i'm coming to you on time,on time
yes i see you but you don't see me
and i'm sure you'll excuse me then
maybe you're in front of me but i can't reach you
but i'm carrying you in the heart for sure
no matter how much i get tired and no matter how much the road will be hard
i'm coming to you on time,on time
i'm not leaving you ,i'm all for you
i feel homesikness and challenge the world
i'm coming to take you to the other world
maybe you're in front of me but i can't reach you
but i'm carrying you in the heart for sure
no matter how much i get tired and no matter how much the road will be hard
i'm coming to you on time,on time

english.title: The light is in the hearts
text: The light is in the hearts
Embrace the strings of the sun in the sunset
Either you're as large as life
Or you live alone in the streets
Desperation is weakness and fear is a coward
Either you're as large as life
Or you live alone in the streets
touch the greenness of the trees
Feel the shine of the moon
The light is in the hearts
Embrace the strings of the sun in the sunset
Either you're as large as life
Or you live alone in the streets
Many people are content with fate
and some see with a blind conscience
Either you're as large as life
Or you live alone in the streets
Refine the biterness of the days
Your soul is in your body

arabic.title: بحبك موت
text: بحبك موت .. ولو عمرى ف هواكى يفوت
هاعيش و هاموت .. و انا لسة باحبك موت (x2)
مافيش ف ايدى أقدمه غير بس وردة
و كلمة حلوة حنينة على حبى شاهدة (x2)
يا شغلانى .. يا ملكانى .. قوليلى اعمل ايه تانى  (x2)
مافيش ف ايدى أقدمه غير بس وردة
و كلمة حلوة حنينة على حبى شاهدة (x2)

english.title: I love you to death
text: I love you to death .. even if my life (age) in your love passes by
, I will live & die, with me still loving you to death. (x2)
There is nothing in my hand/grip (at my reach) to offer but a rose
& a word that's sweet & kind/tender on my love as a witness. (x2)
I love you, I love you, Ah/yes, I love you to death ...
I'm longing for you & I'm needing you
to hold me, to feel what I fell, to call me in longing & find me.
Your love, O my soul, is inside me,
you the one who is, distracting me, owning me, tell me what else to do (x2)
There is nothing in my hand/grip (at my reach) to offer but a rose
& a word that's sweet & kind/tender on my love as a witness. (x2)
I love you, I love you, Ah/yes, I love you to death ...

arabic.title: جمل المحامل
text: يا ابو كل شيء له تمن

english.title: The Camel Carrying Bearings
text: The camel that's carrying bearings has crumbled
because of how tilted its bearings have become..
But the malady is within my tamer
In these times everything has a price
They are the cheapest of times..
Safety has gone away and never came back,
And justice is in a hospital's recovery room..

arabic.title: حبيبي يا عاشق
text: حبيبى يا عاشق ، يا حرّ زى الطير
شاور هاقول حاضر ، للحب قلبى أسير
الحلم دا حلمنا ، والحب من حقنا
مين اللى يمنع طير .. إنه يطير فى السما
الحلم دا حلمنا ، والحب من حقنا
مين اللى يمنع طير .. إنه يطير فى السما

english.title: My Love, In love
text: My love, in love & free like birds
Just sign & I would say yes. For love my heart is a captive
This dream is ours, & love is our right
Who could possibly prevent a bird from flying in the sky!
With you I would challenge the universe
My heart is madly in love with you
This dream is ours, & love is our right
Who could possibly prevent a bird from flying in the sky!

arabic.title: خاصمت الشوارع - Khasemt Alshawarea
text: وكل الحاجات اللي كانت تفوت علينا سوا

english.title: I became at odds with the streets
text: I became at odds with the streets, I became at odds with the houses
And all the things that we used to pass by together
Long is the road when you are faraway
I'm searching in the crowds for a hand
The smile dies in my eyes
Even more things die in my heart
I became at odds with the streets & the houses
The earth is sad after you
And since that day rain is being silent
You the one taking my river with you
My Nile starts from your heart
And from your to my heart it goes through
I became at odds with the streets & the houses

arabic.title: قادرين يا دنيا
text: ما هى كل حاجة ربنا كاتبها
وأهى كل حاجة بتيجى في معادها
أيام بتكون قوية وقاسية على ناسها
أيام بتكون قوية وقاسية على ناسها
أيام بتكون قوية وقاسية على ناسها
أيام بتكون قوية وقاسية على ناسها

english.title: O Life, we can
text: And we will be finding, day by day, our dreams
We are so patient and satisfied1
We go on with no fear
We get exhausted, so what? No matter what we see,
We put our trust in God
Asking for his support and satisfaction
But some other times life changes grief in a second
Life is much better with its troubles
But only for whom, who can understand (the moral of) the story
Why shall we bother ourselves by overthinking?
Our shares are in the hand of The Creator2
Sometimes Life can be hard and tough on people
And sometimes it clears and raises us all up high
Sometimes Life can be hard and tough on people
And sometimes it clears and raises us all up high
When life becomes full of distress
It can be defeated just by a some patience
We keep our heads high no matter what
Burden then becomes too heavy and backbreaking
Why don't we look at the full half of the cup*
But some other times life changes grief in a second
Life is much better with its troubles
But only for whom, who can understand (the moral of) the story
Sometimes Life can be hard and tough on people
And sometimes it clears and raises us all up high
Sometimes Life can be hard and tough on people
And sometimes it clears and raises us all up high

arabic.title: نازل و أنا ماشي
text: و انا لما جيت من الغيب

english.title: Going Out Walking
text: And you are the reason why, father
You never laid down a garden for me
Upon which I can live as a [respectful] human
With the world in my hands
When I came from the unknown
only to find myself in the basement
We have no place in it
And those who are kind in this world

arabic.title: وانا ويايا بعيش
text: وجناني ده شئ مش سهل، تقدر تتجنن زيي؟
انا احب اسهر للصبح وعمري عمري ماروّح بدري
مخلوق رافض للنصح والعمر بقيسه بسهري
وبصاحب كل الخلق، البيه صاحبي والفقري
و اتعشى ف باب الخلق و افطر ع البحر ف بحري
بحلم وانا معاييش انا بحلم وانا معاييش
بحلم وانا معاييش انا بحلم وانا معاييش

english.title: While I have money, I live
text: While I have money, I live like a millionaire
And while I'm bankrupt, I dream and never curse the hardships
Crazy, and my craziness is the pure sanity
And that sanity is a sickness
And my craziness is something that's not easy, can you go crazy like me?
I like to stay up till morning and never ever go home early
A creature reluctant to advice and I measure my age by the nights I stayed up late
And I'm friends with all, the Rich is my friend and the poor
I have dinner in"Bab El khalk"* and breakfast on the sea in"bahary" **
When it gets to lunch I find no money yet I don't curse the hardships
While I have money, I live like a millionaire
And while I'm bankrupt, I dream and never curse the hardships
While I'm bankrupt I dream, I dream while I'm bankrupt  X2

arabic.title: ابن مصر
text: قالوا عني زمان موهوم بيضيع وقت
أمشي عالصعب وعرفت انا لما كبرت
أنا رافع راسي تملي لفوق طول العمر
ماقدرش أعيش أبداً يوم غير وانا حر
أنا رافع راسي تملي لفوق طول العمر
ماقدرش أعيش أبداً يوم غير وانا حر

english.title: Son of Egypt
text: Here I believed in my dream and started
In the past they were describing me as a delusional wasting his time
But I've never given up or surrendered
I fell down and stood back. Now is not the same as yesterday
Here is the bottom of my heart
This is what gives me power
And here I came before others
From here I decided, after thinking
To step over difficulties. I learned when I grew old
That what you think of as a crisis1
Look at those, who laughed at you in the past
On your loss. But you won
I'm raising my head up high my whole life
I can't live for single day unless I'm free
I've been through countless crises and situations
But clashes make stronger not destroy
I've been through countless crises and situations
But clashes make stronger not destroy
I'm raising my head up high my whole life
I can't live for single day unless I'm free
